attributes.action: keep interest rates at a level which preserves the spending power of savings.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Most savings accounts now offer interest rates which are insufficient to offset the effect of inflation.
If the failure of the Government and regulatory bodies to avert the current economic crisis is deemed to justify intervention then the burden should be distributed fairly over the whole community.  It is manifestly unfair that the prudent, whatever their financial situation, should be selected to subsidise all borrowers, whether they deserve special consideration or not.

rejection.details: Government does not decide the level of interest rates - this is now decided by the Bank of England independently of Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
